00029 //template< typename Container>
00030 std::list<CvPoint> erExtractCvPoints( IplImage *im, CvRect rect=cvRect(0,0,0,0), uint delta=1, uint gray_level=255)
00031 {  
00032   //typedef typename Container::value_type CvPoint;
00033   std::list<CvPoint> pts;
00034   int y, x;
00035   IsEqualTo is_equal_255( gray_level); /* Definition d un foncteur comme critere pour extraire des pixels suivant leur niveau de gris. cf->utilities/erPredicates.hpp */     
00036 
00037   for( y = 0; y < im->height; y+=delta)
00038     { 
00039       for( x = 0; x < im->width; x+=delta)
00040         { 
00041           CvScalar a = cvGet2D(im,y,x);
00042           if( is_equal_255(a.val[0]))
00043             { 
00044               CvPoint p;
00045               p.x = x+rect.x;
00046               p.y = y+rect.y;
00047               pts.push_back(p); 
00048             }
00049         }
00050     }
00051   return pts;
00052 };
00053

00214 template< typename Container>
00215 void erExtractCurveMacroDropUser( IplImage* simag, Container &pts, CvRect recROI, erCerc* cerc, char* file_name)
00216 {
00217   //typedef Container typeContainer;
00218   typedef std::map< double, Container> erMap;
00219   erMap ptsMap;
00220   typename erMap::iterator iterMap;
00221   typename Container::iterator iterV_polyvalent, iterV_pts;
00222   
00223   for( iterV_polyvalent = pts.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != pts.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00224     {
00225       ptsMap[iterV_polyvalent->x].push_back(*iterV_polyvalent);
00226     }
00227   pts.clear();
00228   
00229       std::pair< CvPoint, int> cercle = erCvDebutCurve( simag);
00230       cerc->centro = cercle.first;
00231       cerc->radio = cercle.second;
00232       CvPoint p_polyvalent;
00233       std::vector< int> ptsDmin, ptsY0;
00234       std::vector< int>::iterator iterDmin;
00235       bool Dmin = false;
00236       int a = 0, b = 0, c = 0;
00237       iterMap = ptsMap.begin();
00238       for( iterV_polyvalent = iterMap->second.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != iterMap->second.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00239         {
00240           a = abs( iterV_polyvalent->y - cercle.first.y);
00241           if( a <= cercle.second)
00242             {
00243               if( a < b || Dmin==false)
00244                 {
00245                   c = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00246                   Dmin = true;
00247                   b = a;
00248                 }
00249             }
00250         }
00251       if( Dmin)
00252         {
00253           
00254           p_polyvalent.x = iterMap->first;
00255           p_polyvalent.y = c;
00256          
00257           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00258 
00259         }
00260       else
00261         {
00262 
00263           std::ofstream file( nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00264           file << file_name << std::endl;
00265           file << std::endl;
00266           pts.clear();
00267           return; 
00268         }
00269       int A=0;
00270       iterMap++;
00271       for( ; iterMap != ptsMap.end(); iterMap++)
00272         { 
00273           CvPoint cpt = pts.back();
00274           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y));
00275           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00276             { 
00277               iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00278               if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00279                 {
00280                   iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00281                   if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00282                     {
00283                       iterMap--;
00284                       iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00285                       if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==-1)
00286                         {
00287                           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00288                           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==1)
00289                             {
00290 
00291                               std::ofstream file( nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00292                               file << file_name << std::endl;
00293                               file << std::endl;
00294                               pts.clear();
00295                               return;
00296                             }
00297                           else
00298                             {
00299                               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00300                               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00301                               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00302                              
00303                               A=-1;
00304                             }
00305                         }
00306                       else
00307                         {
00308                           p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00309                           p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00310                           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00311                           
00312                           A=1;
00313                         }
00314                     }
00315                   else
00316                     {
00317                       p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00318                       p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00319                       pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00320                      
00321                       A=0;
00322                     }
00323                 }
00324               else
00325                 {
00326                   p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00327                   p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00328                   pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00329                  
00330                   A=0;
00331                 }
00332             }
00333           else
00334             {
00335               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00336               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00337               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00338               
00339               A=0;
00340             }
00341         }
00342      
00343       for( iterV_pts = pts.begin(); iterV_pts != pts.end(); iterV_pts++)
00344         {
00345           iterV_pts->x = iterV_pts->x + recROI.x;
00346           iterV_pts->y = iterV_pts->y + recROI.y;
00347         }
00348 };

00484 // template< typename Container>
00485 // void erExtractionCurve( IplImage* simag, erCerc* cerc, char** file_name, Container &pts, CvRect recROI )
00486 // >>>>>>> .r56
00487 template< typename Container>
00488 void erExtractCurveMacroDrop( IplImage* simag, Container &pts, CvRect recROI, erCerc* cerc, char* file_name )
00489 {
00490   //typedef Container typeContainer;
00491   typedef std::map< double, Container> erMap;
00492   erMap ptsMap;
00493   typename erMap::iterator iterMap;
00494   typename Container::iterator iterV_polyvalent, iterV_pts;
00495   
00496   for( iterV_polyvalent = pts.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != pts.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00497     {
00498       ptsMap[iterV_polyvalent->x].push_back(*iterV_polyvalent);
00499     }
00500   pts.clear();
00501   
00502       std::pair< CvPoint, int> cercle(cerc->centro, cerc->radio);
00503       CvPoint p_polyvalent;
00504       std::vector< int> ptsDmin, ptsY0;
00505       std::vector< int>::iterator iterDmin;
00506       bool Dmin = false;
00507       int a = 0, b = 0, c = 0;
00508       iterMap = ptsMap.begin();
00509       for( iterV_polyvalent = iterMap->second.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != iterMap->second.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00510         {
00511           a = abs( iterV_polyvalent->y - cercle.first.y);
00512           if( a <= cercle.second)
00513             {
00514               if( a < b || Dmin==false)
00515                 {
00516                   c = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00517                   Dmin = true;
00518                   b = a;
00519                 }
00520             }
00521         }
00522       if( Dmin)
00523         {
00524           
00525           p_polyvalent.x = iterMap->first;
00526           p_polyvalent.y = c;
00527          
00528           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00529         
00530         }
00531       else
00532         {
00533           std::ofstream file(nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00534           file << file_name << std::endl; // A proscrire
00535           file << std::endl;
00536           pts.clear();
00537           return; 
00538         }
00539       int A=0;
00540       iterMap++;
00541       for( ; iterMap != ptsMap.end(); iterMap++)
00542         { 
00543           CvPoint cpt = pts.back();
00544           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y));
00545           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00546             { 
00547               iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00548               if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00549                 {
00550                   iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00551                   if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00552                     {
00553                       iterMap--;
00554                       iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00555                       if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==-1)
00556                         {
00557                           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00558                           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==1)
00559                             {
00560                               std::ofstream file(nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00561                               file << file_name << std::endl;  // A proscire
00562                               file << std::endl;
00563                               pts.clear();
00564                               return;
00565                             }
00566                           else
00567                             {
00568                               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00569                               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00570                               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00571                            
00572                               A=-1;
00573                             }
00574                         }
00575                       else
00576                         {
00577                           p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00578                           p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00579                           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00580                         
00581                           A=1;
00582                         }
00583                     }
00584                   else
00585                     {
00586                       p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00587                       p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00588                       pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00589                       
00590                       A=0;
00591                     }
00592                 }
00593               else
00594                 {
00595                   p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00596                   p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00597                   pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00598                 
00599                   A=0;
00600                 }
00601             }
00602           else
00603             {
00604               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00605               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00606               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00607             
00608               A=0;
00609             }
00610         };
00611     
00612       for( iterV_pts = pts.begin(); iterV_pts != pts.end(); iterV_pts++)
00613         {
00614           iterV_pts->x = iterV_pts->x + recROI.x;
00615           iterV_pts->y = iterV_pts->y + recROI.y;
00616         }
00617 };
00618 
00619 
00620 
00621 
00622 template< typename Container>
00623 void erConvertPixelToMks( std::pair< double, double> factor, Container &pts, char* file_name, char* exit_name)
00624 {
00625   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00626   bool good_format;
00627   const char* num;
00628   boost::tie(good_format,num) = erGetNumberInFileName( file_name);
00629 
00630 
00631   if(good_format)
00632     {
00633       char* new_name = erConcatenateFileName( exit_name,"_data_",num,".txt");     
00634       //Ouverture du fichier
00635       std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00636       if (myfile.is_open())
00637         {
00638           //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00639           typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00640           Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00641           Iterator fin=pts.end();
00642           
00643           for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00644             {
00645               myfile << deb->x*factor.first << "  " << deb->y*factor.second << std::endl;
00646             }     
00647           myfile.close();
00648         }
00649       else 
00650         {
00651           std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00652         }
00653     }
00654   else
00655     {
00656       std::cout << "error in format input file images";
00657     } 
00658 };

00714 template< typename Container>
00715 void erPrintCvPoint( Container & pts, char* file_name, char* exit_name)
00716 {
00717   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00718   char* new_name = erEcrireNomFichier( file_name, exit_name, "_curvCV_");
00719 
00720   //Ouverture du ficher
00721   std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00722   if (myfile.is_open())
00723     {
00724       //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00725       typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00726       Iterator it;      
00727       for( it = pts.begin(); it != pts.end(); it++)
00728         {         
00729           myfile << it->x << "  " << it->y << std::endl;
00730         }         
00731       myfile.close();
00732     }
00733   else 
00734     {
00735       std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00736     }
00737 };

00742 // ATTENTION Test uniquement sur y precise a quoi sert cette fonction
00743 template< typename Iterator>
00744 Iterator erFindCvPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CvPoint punto)
00745 {
00746   while(p1 != p2)
00747     {
00748       if( p1->y == punto.y)
00749         {
00750           return p1;
00751           break;
00752         }
00753       p1++;
00754     }
00755   return p2;
00756 };
